text:
W1022H2 Pro, personal device, Windows installed on SSD. Ran Windows Update after reading your message. Windows Update After installing 5031224 Windows Update notice indicated * Restart now Action Center(notification) indicated * Restart after/outside active hours …but, Windows Update was still in the process of downloading and installing the October Update 5031356. Ignored warning to restart. Once 5031356 completed install, restarted via WU ‘Restart’ option Only one reboot after all patches, took about 5 minutes to install to ~30% before restart, another 3-4 minutes to complete(don’t turn off, etc.) and about 1 minute with Welcome(Microsoft Account outlook.com email logon) screen then to desktop(normally about 5-6 seconds after pin entry to desktop) * Logged off and switched to another logon(another MSA, msn.com) took about 3
 minutes ‘Welcoming’ before desktop(normally the same 5-6 seconds after pin
 entry to desktop) ..w %40BYAPR05MB6552.namprd05.prod.outlook.com

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Windows 10  WU - three reboots
